:v-model.description: The name of the currently expanded panel
:v-model.type: 手风琴模式：number | string 非手风琴模式：(number | string)[]

accordion.description: Whether accordion mode is turned on

border.description: Whether to display the outer border

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggle all panel expansion states, pass 'true' to expand all, 'false' to collapse all, and no parameters to switch all
methods.description_zh: 切换所有面板展开状态，传 `true` 为全部展开，`false` 为全部收起，不传参为全部切换

events.name: change
events.params: activeNames: 类型与 v-model 绑定的值一致
